alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 20 at 8:00PM PDT until August 20 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN INYO COUNTY... At 800 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Mudslide reported along Highway 395 at Ash Creek Road. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Olancha, Lone Pine, Independence, Cartago, Keeler, Diaz Lake, Portagee Lake Campground, Tuttle Creek Campground, Whitney Portal Campground, Independence Creek Campground, Homewood Canyon-Valley Wells, Onion Valley Campground, Oak Creek Campground and Sawmill Creek Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
